description: Updates the specified parameters for a transformer. A transformer can take an EDI file as input and transform it into a JSON-or XML-formatted document. Alternatively, a transformer can take a JSON-or XML-formatted document as input and transform it into an EDI file.

parameters.name: transformerId
parameters.description: Specifies the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

parameters.name: mappingTemplate
parameters.description: Specifies the mapping template for the transformer. This template is used to map the parsed EDI file using JSONata or XSLT.

parameters.name: ediType
parameters.description: Specifies the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents. x12Details (dict) --- Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. transactionSet (string) --- Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee. version (string) --- Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_params.name: x12Details
nested_params.description: Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents.

nested_params.name: transactionSet
nested_params.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

parameters.name: inputConversion
parameters.description: To update, specify the InputConversion object, which contains the format options for the inbound transformation. The format for the transformer input: currently on X12 is supported. formatOptions (dict) --- A structure that contains the formatting options for an inbound transformer. x12 (dict) --- A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version. The X12 structure is used when the system transforms an EDI (electronic data interchange) file. transactionSet (string) --- Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee. version (string) --- Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_params.name: fromFormat
nested_params.description: The format for the transformer input: currently on X12 is supported.

nested_params.name: formatOptions
nested_params.description: A structure that contains the formatting options for an inbound transformer.

nested_params.name: x12
nested_params.description: A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version. The X12 structure is used when the system transforms an EDI (electronic data interchange) file.

nested_params.name: transactionSet
nested_params.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

parameters.name: mapping
parameters.description: Specify the structure that contains the mapping template and its language (either XSLT or JSONATA). The transformation language for the template, either XSLT or JSONATA. template (string) --- A string that represents the mapping template, in the transformation language specified in templateLanguage.

nested_params.name: templateLanguage
nested_params.description: The transformation language for the template, either XSLT or JSONATA.

nested_params.name: template
nested_params.description: A string that represents the mapping template, in the transformation language specified in templateLanguage.

parameters.name: outputConversion
parameters.description: To update, specify the OutputConversion object, which contains the format options for the outbound transformation. The format for the output from an outbound transformer: only X12 is currently supported. formatOptions (dict) --- A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version for the transformer output. x12 (dict) --- A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version. The X12 structure is used when the system transforms an EDI (electronic data interchange) file. transactionSet (string) --- Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee. version (string) --- Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_params.name: toFormat
nested_params.description: The format for the output from an outbound transformer: only X12 is currently supported.

nested_params.name: formatOptions
nested_params.description: A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version for the transformer output.

nested_params.name: x12
nested_params.description: A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version. The X12 structure is used when the system transforms an EDI (electronic data interchange) file.

nested_params.name: transactionSet
nested_params.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

parameters.name: sampleDocuments
parameters.description: Specify a structure that contains the Amazon S3 bucket and an array of the corresponding keys used to identify the location for your sample documents. Contains the Amazon S3 bucket that is used to hold your sample documents. Contains an array of the Amazon S3 keys used to identify the location for your sample documents. (dict) --- An array of the Amazon S3 keys used to identify the location for your sample documents. input (string) --- An array of keys for your input sample documents. output (string) --- An array of keys for your output sample documents.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket that is used to hold your sample documents.

nested_params.name: keys
nested_params.description: Contains an array of the Amazon S3 keys used to identify the location for your sample documents.

nested_params.name: input
nested_params.description: An array of keys for your input sample documents.

nested_params.name: output
nested_params.description: An array of keys for your output sample documents.

nested_items.name: transformerId
nested_items.description: Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

nested_items.name: transformerArn
nested_items.description: Returns an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a specific Amazon Web Services resource, such as a capability, partnership, profile, or transformer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Returns the name of the transformer.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Returns the state of the newly created transformer. The transformer can be either active or inactive. For the transformer to be used in a capability, its status must active.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp for creation date and time of the transformer.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp for last time the transformer was modified.

nested_items.name: fileFormat
nested_items.description: Returns that the currently supported file formats for EDI transformations are JSON and XML.

nested_items.name: mappingTemplate
nested_items.description: Returns the mapping template for the transformer. This template is used to map the parsed EDI file using JSONata or XSLT.

nested_items.name: x12Details
nested_items.description: Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents.

nested_items.name: transactionSet
nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.name: sampleDocument
nested_items.description: Returns a sample EDI document that is used by a transformer as a guide for processing the EDI data.

nested_items.name: inputConversion
nested_items.description: Returns the InputConversion object, which contains the format options for the inbound transformation.

nested_items.description: The format for the transformer input: currently on X12 is supported.

nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.description: The transformation language for the template, either XSLT or JSONATA.

nested_items.name: template
nested_items.description: A string that represents the mapping template, in the transformation language specified in templateLanguage.
